thread.title: Glitch Exploited by High-Speed Traders is Back at CME

author: Alexander Osipovich
title: Glitch Exploited by High-Speed Traders is Back at CME
text:
Five years ago, the worldâ€™s largest exchange operator vowed to fix a flaw in its systems that allowed high-speed traders to infer the direction of the futures market a fraction of a second before everyone else.
Now, the defect is back at CME Group Inc., traders say. And some allege it is yielding rich profits for ultrafast firms at the expense of ordinary investors.
